<style>
:root { --news-blue:#0d6efd; }

.news-wrap {
  max-width: 980px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 12px;
}

.news-intro {
  margin: 22px auto 8px;
  font-size: 1.05rem;
  line-height: 1.8;
  color: #333;
  font-family: system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
}

.news-badge {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 0.78rem;
  padding: 0.2em 0.6em;
  border-radius: 999px;
  background: #f5f9ff;
  border: 1px solid #d8e2f1;
  color: #0b3d91;
}

.project-card {
  border: 1px solid #e7ebf3;
  border-radius: 14px;
  padding: 1rem 1.1rem;
  background: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);
  transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;
}
.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
}

.project-card .btn {
  margin-top: 0.25rem;
}

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.42em;
  padding: 0.52rem 0.9rem;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #d6e4ff;
  text-decoration: none;
  background: #f5f9ff;
  color: #0b3d91;
  font-weight: 600;
}
.btn:hover {
  background: #eef5ff;
  border-color: #c8dafc;
  color: #08347a;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.columns > .column {
  display: flex;
}
.columns > .column > .project-card {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  height: 100%;
}

.news-tl {
  --datew: 120px;
  --dot: var(--news-blue);
  position: relative;
}

.news-tl-year {
  font-weight: 800;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin: 28px 0 10px;
}

.news-tl-list {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 28px 1fr;
  row-gap: 16px;
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.news-tl-list::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: calc(var(--datew) + 14px);
  width: 3px;
  background: linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    rgba(13,110,253,0.35) 0%,
    rgba(13,110,253,0.45) 20%,
    rgba(13,110,253,0.45) 80%,
    rgba(13,110,253,0.35) 100%
  );
  border-radius: 2px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(13,110,253,0.08);
}

.news-tl-item {
  display: contents;
}

.news-tl-date {
  grid-column: 1;
  align-self: start;
  justify-self: end;
  text-align: right;
  padding-right: 12px;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--dot);
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.news-tl-dot {
  grid-column: 2;
  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid var(--dot);
  background: #fff;
  justify-self: center;
  align-self: start;
  margin-top: 0.6rem;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(13,110,253,0.12);
}

.news-tl-card {
  grid-column: 3;
}

@media (max-width:740px) {
  .news-tl { --datew: 98px; }
  .news-tl-list { grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 26px 1fr; }
}

@media (max-width:480px) {
  .news-tl { --datew: 86px; }
  .news-tl-date { font-size: 0.9rem; }
  .news-tl-list { grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 24px 1fr; }
}
</style>
